events.message: I received the product yesterday, but it has a large scratch on the screen and does not work properly.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to the mention of a scratch and malfunction.
Your case has been assigned to one of our support agents who will assist you further.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the product arrived damaged. I’m here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch on the screen and describe any other problems you are experiencing with the product?
I’ve attached several pictures showing the scratch clearly. Also, when I try to turn it on, the screen stays black and there is no response.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped to you within 3 business days. Please confirm if you would like us to proceed.
Yes, I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and help.
Your replacement order has been processed and shipped. You will receive tracking details shortly. Please let us know if there is anything else you need.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement product and that everything is now working as expected.
